reviews.customers_say: Customers find the turtlenecks comfortable, soft, and well-fitting, with good length and sleeves. The sweaters receive positive feedback for their quality, pattern, and warmth, with one customer noting the pattern makes them look like proper sweaters. However, customers disagree on the sizing, with several mentioning they run small, and some note the material is very thin.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for Everyday
items.body: Thin, not see through, soft, warm. Sleeves are long enough, length is good, the pattern makes them look like sweaters rather than "just" a turtle neck. Can dress up, down, layer. Came out of the wash fine, dried separate from other clothing for 30 min on low heat. Not shrinkage, no pilling. Reviews were mixed on sizing so I sized up to XL. A L would probably have been fine. They are comfy and I'm keeping them. Read more
items.author: Kindle Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty, Soft, Size Up
items.body: I cannot say how these wash but out of the bag, they are very soft have a smooth interior, heathered subtle colors (blue, lavender, grey pack) and run a bit small. Based on the reviews I ordered large rather than medium and they fit perfectly. The neck is not too tight on my medium sized neck. Overall, these have a lot of stretch and will be good for winter with a thermal underneath. They are lightweight, close cut, very attractive turtleneck tops. Read more
items.author: Enteranet

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not soft on the inside
items.body: These sweaters are good quality, they do run smaller though. Definitely get a size up I’d say. Another important note is that they are NOT soft on the inside which is one of my biggest pet peeves with sweaters like this. Overall they are almost worth the money and they look nice. Read more
items.author: Arina N.

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Disappointed
items.body: Much smaller than I anticipated and also material is soft but very thin Read more
items.author: Nancy J Shemanski

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality at low price
items.body: Comfy, fits well and goes with everything. Read more
items.author: Susan B. Shreeve

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So soft! I am very happy!!
items.body: Fabric is buttery soft. Fabric on the thin side, but I like it that way. Not bulky at all. Soft colors, I am 5'2, 115 lbs. I ordered medium. Fits very well. Longer length (I prefer over cropped) and sleeves are "sweetly" longer in length. Hope they hold up in the wash. I will do on gentle cycle just in case. Read more
items.author: Marlene McNamara

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Buyer beware!!
items.body: I would not even give these 1 star but you have to rate them in order to leave a review. Poorest quality product I have ever purchased on Amazon. Read more
items.author: Kindle Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable yet a little thin
items.body: I wanted a thick sweater but these will do. The material is very soft and I like the size. I will order more when I'm able too. Read more
items.author: Kindle Customer

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Dark Blue, Gray, Wine Red, Dark Gray, Blue, Purple, Black, Coffee, Apricot, Black, Apricot, Wine Red, Black, Blue, Cream, Black, Navy Blue, Wine Red, Haze Blue, Light Gray, Pumpkin, Black, Dark Gray, Light Gray, Watermelon Red, Gray Green, Khaki, Black, Caramel, Light Gray, Light Green, Pink, Haze Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
